home.name: Wahab Hameed
home.compactAbout: Passionate QA Engineer with 1.3+ year of expertise in manual & automation testing (Cypress), performance (JMeter), API (Postman), and security (Burp Suite)-ensuring top-tier software quality with precision, agility, and a keen eye for detail!

about.expandedAbout: Results-driven Software Quality Assurance Engineer with 1+ year of experience in ensuring high software quality standards. Proficient in manual and automation testing (Cypress), performance testing (JMeter), API testing (Postman), and security testing (Burp Suite). Adept in test planning, execution, and bug tracking. Skilled in Agile methodologies, with a strong ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams for successful project deliveries. Experienced in the software development process and optimal testing strategies. Open and clear communicator with strong multi-tasking skills, an organized nature, and keen attention to detail.

skill.description: My technical skill includes proficiency in JAVA, MuleSoft, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Spring Boot. I'm also well-versed in creating APIs, AWS Cloud, and Azure DevOps.
